1.0.2.name: wordpress/addthis-button-for-post
1.0.2.description:
Addthis button on post, configure button location, alignment, facebbok, addthis, twitter, email, Delicious options available.

Features 1) All social network share included. 2) Configurable options for buttons. 3) Can set button location, alignment, show/hide buttons. 4) Easy to use not much configuration required.

List of my WordPress Plugins

  • HP - Picasa Web Album Photos
  • HP - Google Language Translator.
  • Generate Social Network Profile QR Code.
  • YouTube Video Plugin to show YouTube Videos from widgets.
  • HP
